actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Illumination
special_abilities.desc: The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. When it dies, its body continues to glow for another 6 hours.
